name: Conquer the Dungeon
description:
Conquer the Dungeon

Welcome to conquer the dungeon! This is a simple roguelike where you have to conquer the randomly generated dungeon!

Controls:

Click and aim with the mouse to use your sword.

Icon in the bottom right to open inventory;

Right Click to advance dialogue and interact with the world.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Credits:

Icons: https://kyrise.itch.io/kyrises-free-16x16-rpg-icon-pack

Tile-set and Enemies: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Background Music: https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-ambience

Npcs: https://superdark.itch.io/16x16-free-npc-pack and https://superdark.itch.io/enchanted-forest-characters

Portal Texture: https://opengameart.org/content/portal-animation

Sound Effects: Made by me on https://www.bfxr.net
